name: IGLU Java IR Library
short_description: IGLU is a Java class library designed to facilitate sharing of code among Artificial Intelligence/Information Retrieval researchers to illustrate how various problems can be solved in Java. It is developed and maintained by the IGLU Research Group.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: Apache Software License
